name: Speedy for IOS
body:
# Welcome to Speedy!
The competitive time-pressed math game that uses simple arithmetic operations to challenge your abilities
We've created an evolution of our app to demonstrate the process by which our app was constructed

-----
# A Look at Our Game View

### Initial Game Design (WhiteBoard)
![Game flow](/images/speedy_gameplay.jpg)

### First Look at Our Game with Code!
![Game Play V1](/images/gameplay_1.jpg)

### After Some Work With UI and Game Scene Physics...
![Game Play V2](/images/gameplay_2.jpg)

### Our Finished Version
![Game Play V3](/images/finalgameplay.jpg)

-----

# The Flow of the App

### First Look at Our Game with Code!

### Our Final Results Page

### Our Final Intro Page
